column1: The Pit Room////This place was absolutely amazing. Definitely one of the top BBQ places I have been to in Houston. I ordered the two meat plate
column2: which comes with two sides. I elected to have the pork ribs
column5: and charro beans. I also added queso/chips. This is a fast casual joint. You order at the counter and shuffle down the line to pick out your sides and other accompaniments. After you pay
column6: you can then travel to their condiments bar to load up on different sauces
